user.title: EV Smart Charger Setup
user.description:
This wizard will guide you through setting up your EV Smart Charger.

We will configure the following in steps:
1. **Charger:** Zaptec switches and limits.
2. **Car:** Battery sensors and charging limits.
3. **Meter:** House load and fuses.
4. **Planning:** Prices, Calendar, and Currencies.

car.title: 2. Car Setup
car.description: Configure your Car sensors and optional limits.

meter.title: 3. Electricity Meter
meter.description:
Configure your P1 meter sensors and Main Fuse size.

**Note:** If you have separate sensors for the Charger's current usage, add them here to improve load balancing accuracy.

price_calendar.title: 4. Price & Planning
price_calendar.description: Configure Electricity Prices, Calendar integration, and general settings.
